ygData.subject: RE: Re: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks all for the assist with the crafted items quests. Over the weekend, my warrior got Crafted Helm, greaves, and boots (lreadying having gauntlets and
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks all for the assist with the crafted items quests. Over the weekend,
my warrior got Crafted Helm, greaves, and boots (lreadying having gauntlets
and bracer)! WOOHOO!!

Dark Circlet is off Trezdon in Najena
Frost Totem is off Goblin Patriach in King room in Permafrost (need a level
30-34 group to break spawn)
Fire Totem off some goblin in SolA, I hear High Shaman, but I got it from a
friend (gave the gems to a friend and she did the quest and handed me the
greaves).

Now, all I missing is a Breastplate and Pauldron I think... Lets see, Talon
and rune of the Dwarves... I know where the talons are (don't know how to
get to the gypsy/werewolves...will have to wait for one to train to zone
prolly), but I'm not sure where the Evil Eyes are in Beholder. Seen one near
the purple crystals in the water, but don't know where they spawn? Anyone
help me out?

Also gonna need to find Borxx, since he drops one of the three peices I
hear. Where does he spawn, and how often?

Thanks again for everyone's assistance in the crafted quests!!
